title: 17: S6E17 – "Where It All Ends" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Matt Dymerski, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry. Matt is an award-winning Ohio-based author of horror and science fiction who has been entertaining readers for over a decade, and was the winner of Reddit NoSleep‘s “Best Multi-Part Story of 2012” for his Asylum series, as well as the forum’s “Best Story of 2017” and “Story of the Month” in January 2018. In tonight’s program, we're confident you’ll see why.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
